moveAgentByVector

public static void moveAgentByVector(IAgent agent,
                                     double distToTravel,
                                     double angle)
Move an agent by a vector. This method is required -- rather than giving agents direct access to the agentGeography -- because when multiple threads are used they can interfere with each other and agents end up moving incorrectly.

Parameters:
agent - The agent to move.
distToTravel - The distance that they will travel
angle - The angle at which to travel.
See Also:
Geography

moveAgent

public static void moveAgent(IAgent agent,
                             com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point point)
Move an agent. This method is required -- rather than giving agents direct access to the agentGeography -- because when multiple threads are used they can interfere with each other and agents end up moving incorrectly.

Parameters:
agent - The agent to move.
point - The point to move the agent to

addAgentToContext

public static void addAgentToContext(IAgent agent)
Add an agent to the agent context. This method is required -- rather than giving agents direct access to the agentGeography -- because when multiple threads are used they can interfere with each other and agents end up moving incorrectly.

Parameters:
agent - The agent to add.

getAllAgents

public static java.lang.Iterable<IAgent> getAllAgents()
Get all the agents in the agent context. This method is required -- rather than giving agents direct access to the agentGeography -- because when multiple threads are used they can interfere with each other and agents end up moving incorrectly.

Returns:
An iterable over all agents, chosen in a random order. See the getRandomObjects function in DefaultContext
See Also:
DefaultContext

getAgentGeometry

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry getAgentGeometry(IAgent agent)
Get the geometry of the given agent. This method is required -- rather than giving agents direct access to the agentGeography -- because when multiple threads are used they can interfere with each other and agents end up moving incorrectly.

getAgentContext

public static repast.simphony.context.Context<IAgent> getAgentContext()
Get a pointer to the agent context.

Warning: accessing the context directly is not thread safe so this should be used with care. The functions getAllAgents() and getAgentGeometry() can be used to query the agent context or projection.

getAgentGeography

public static repast.simphony.space.gis.Geography<IAgent> getAgentGeography()
Get a pointer to the agent geography.

Warning: accessing the context directly is not thread safe so this should be used with care. The functions getAllAgents() and getAgentGeometry() can be used to query the agent context or projection.
